Name: SEARCH ALL - CHRISTMAS
About the game: SEARCH ALL - CHRISTMAS is a game in the genre of 'hidden object', in which you need to find all the Christmas candy in the form of a cane (caramel cane) on a large location drawn in the style of 'doodling'. The location depicts a winter city. In the foreground of the location is a railway, along which a locomotive periodically passes. Also in the foreground is a carousel with horses, and next to it children are making a snowman. In the middle there is a frozen pond where people are doing their favorite things, someone is skating, and someone is fishing. Between the front layer of the location and the back, there is a huge bridge along the entire settlement. In the background, a viewing wheel rotates and there is a large apartment building. Key Features: - Animation elements on location; - 'Doodling' design style; - 80 caramel canes to find; - Pleasant soundtrack; - Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint! - The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result.
